org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics

Interface TestUserMetric

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Metric<TrainTestEvalTask>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTestUserMetric, CoveragePredictMetric, EntropyPredictMetric, HLUtilityPredictMetric, MAEPredictMetric, NDCGPredictMetric, NDCGTopNMetric, RMSEPredictMetric, TopNLengthMetric

    public interface TestUserMetric
extends Metric<TrainTestEvalTask>
    Interface for prediction and recommendation accuracy evaluators. Evaluators produce accumulators which in turn accumulate recommendation statistics, returning aggregate error information in the TestUserMetricAccumulator.finalResults() method.
    Since:
    0.10
    Author:
    GroupLens Research

        finishEvaluation, startEvaluation

    • Method Detail

      • makeAccumulator

        TestUserMetricAccumulator makeAccumulator(AlgorithmInstance algorithm,
                                        TTDataSet dataSet)
        Create a result accumulator for a single row for this evaluation. The accumulator will be passed the predictions for each user in turn, then asked for the results from the evaluation to insert into the results table.

        One accumulator is created and used per evaluation (data set × algorithm).

        Individual accumulators do not need to be thread-safe, but it must be possible to have multiple accumulators in separate threads in use concurrently.

        Parameters:
        algorithm - The algorithm to be evaluated.
        dataSet - The data set being evaluated — used if the evaluator needs something from it (such as the preference domain).
        Returns:
        The result accumulator for aggregating prediction results over a single evaluation.

      • getColumnLabels

        List<String> getColumnLabels()
        Get labels for the aggregate columns output by this evaluator.
        Returns:
        The labels for this evaluator's output, used as column headers when outputting the results table.

      • getUserColumnLabels

        List<String> getUserColumnLabels()
        Get labels for the per-user columns output by this evaluator.
        Returns:
        The labels for this evaluator's per-user output, used as column headers when outputting the results table.
        See Also:
        TestUserMetricAccumulator.evaluate(org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest.TestUser)
